segments.text: I notice the sun streaming in through the window, almost too lovely for this mess.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: The woman is so absorbed in her task, she seems part of the furniture.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: But oh, how could she miss the disaster brewing right beneath her?
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: The water is cascading like a waterfall, and no one seems to care.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: The boy looks determined, his focus tightly on the cookie jar.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: I feel a knot forming in my stomach as he stretches further.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: I can already picture him crashing down, the broken jar and scattered cookies everywhere.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: The girl looks so eager, and yet, I can't shake off my anxiety for them.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: Why is there no one to guide them, to show them whatâ€™s safe?
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: This kitchen is a disaster waiting to happen, and I just want to scream.
segments.speaker: PAR
